questions.question: According to reports on President Trump's announcement about removing Fed Governor Lisa Cook, how long is the statutory term for a Federal Reserve governor?
questions.explanation: Federal Reserve governors are appointed to statutory 14-year terms. News coverage of the reported removal noted governors serve 14-year terms (Cook's term runs into 2038 unless removed).

questions.question: On 26 August 2025, which organisation did the Australian government announce it would move to legislate to designate as a terrorist organisation?
questions.explanation: On 26 August 2025 the Australian government announced it would move to legislate to list Iran’s Islamic Revolutionary Guard Corps (IRGC) as a terrorist organisation. (See Reuters and the Australian government press release/transcript reporting the announcement.)

questions.question: How many Victoria Police officers were killed in the Porepunkah (Rayner Track) incident on 26 August 2025?
questions.explanation: Contemporary reporting states two Victoria Police officers were fatally shot during a search-warrant operation at a rural property near Porepunkah on 26 August 2025; a third officer was seriously wounded but survived. Therefore, the number killed is two.

questions.question: When is the 2025 AFL Grand Final — for which Snoop Dogg was announced as the pre‑game entertainer — scheduled to start?
questions.explanation: The AFL confirmed the 2025 Toyota AFL Grand Final is scheduled for Saturday 27 September 2025 with the traditional 2:30pm AEST start (the match kick‑off/opening bounce). Snoop Dogg was announced as the Telstra pre‑game entertainer in media reports, but the official match start time is 2:30pm AEST on 27 Sept 2025.

questions.question: Which director's film titled 'Frankenstein' was listed as a key entry at the 82nd Venice International Film Festival in 2025?
questions.explanation: Guillermo del Toro's film Frankenstein was named among the key entries in the Venezia 82 programme. The other listed directors had different films at Venice 2025 (Paolo Sorrentino — La grazia; Kathryn Bigelow — A House of Dynamite; Yorgos Lanthimos — Bugonia).
